data.name: Antrio
data.detailed_description:
Antrio is a 2D action-platformer inspired by classic games from the 8 bit era. Shoot, drill, climb and fly to fight lots of enemies and overcome the challenges each level has to offer.

Ero, a soldier from planet Antrio, lost his family because of an evil being and swore to stop him and rescue all the prisoners. His mission is to find the power source of energy and escape the planet.

Features:
  • Different transformations that allows you to Shoot, drill, climb and fly.
  • Fight many different enemies.
  • Solve puzzle challenges in a circuit energy ball.
  • Nostalgic art style
  • Original Soundtrack

data.short_description: Antrio is a 2D action-platformer inspired by classic games from the 8 bit era. Shoot, drill, climb and fly to fight lots of enemies and overcome the challenges each level has to offer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bbit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800FTX+ (16G)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
